FuncDef: This command assigns an IP address to the video interface within the service. Video interface IP addresses are used by video service clients to direct requests for video server services. Up to 16 IP address/subnets can be defined. The addresses defined must all be distinct and cannot be contained within a previously defined address. In the VPLS context, only one IP address can be defined for a video interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address/subnet of the video interface in dotted decimal notation.
Specifies the subnet mask length for the IP address expressed as an integer.
